ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Stelfreeze,Dave Cockrum,James Fry III,Joe Brozowski,John Nyberg,Ricardo Villagrán,Richard Howell,Stan Shaw,Steve Leialoha,James Fry,J. J. Birch,Richard Howell,James Fry,Dave Cockrum,J. J. Birch
ComicInfo.Summary:
Having been turned into a vampire, then killed, Chelsea has been returned to her vampire life by a construction worker who removes the stake used to kill her. Chelsea returns to her old friends, but realizes she must leave when the blood lust comes upon her. She is lonely and sad until she discovers a little girl who has been a ghost in a warehouse for a century. Chelsea discovers that cheering up the little girl also raises her spirits.
Pendragon relives his past when gang members working for his estranged daughter show up at the club he is working at to beat him up. They are under orders to kill him, but his grandson orders the thugs to let him go.
One of Adam's agents reports that six people are trapped by something deadly. Adam travels to the site to rescue the people and kills the monster.
ComicInfo.Tags: Adam Van Helsing,Chelsea Cantrell,Pendragon,Cousin Eerie,Vampirella,Uncle Creepy
ComicInfo.Title: Restless Spirit; Magic Tricks; The Reach of the Dead; Vampirella Meets Creepy and Eerie
ComicInfo.Editor: Richard Howell,Jesse Reyes,Meloney Chadwick,Richard Howell,Jesse Reyes,Meloney Chadwick
